attributes.action: Prioritise Christian families for asylum places in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We are a Christian country so they will integrate easier into our society.
attributes.background: Every day we hear about the struggle that Syrian refugees face, Christians however face more dangerous than Muslim refugees. Christians in that part of the world are being persecuted, killed, raped, sold into slavery and much more they deserve to be helped.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107436

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
